message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I believe I can offer you $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to offer you $100 for the product.
